title: ADICOLOR CLASSICS TREFOIL TEE
subtitle: womens original
discription_head: AN EVERYDAY T-SHIRT WITH AUTHENTIC STYLE.
discription: The brand with the 3-Stripes strives to be better. To be the best. Created to be truly original, the Adicolor collection keeps heritage its heart. The iconic Trefoil logo celebrates that energy front and centre on this adidas classic t-shirt. Soft single jersey feels soft against your skin. Our cotton products support sustainable cotton farming. This is part of our ambition to end plastic waste.
value: adidas India Marketing Private Limited, Office no. 6, 2nd Floor, Sector-B, Pocket no. 7, Plot no. 11, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi - 110070

title: SUPERSTAR SHOES
subtitle: womens original
discription_head: ICONIC SHELL-TOE TRAINERS WITH HITS OF GOLD.
discription: Go ahead. Put on your gold hoops and your fanciest jumpsuit. Tonight you're gonna sparkle. adidas Superstar Shoes have been a symbol of self expression for over 50 years. This pair carries on the tradition with golden details that are anything but dull. So lace up in glitzy glam and let your true self shine.
details2: Color: Cloud White / Copper Metallic / Core Black
value: adidas India Marketing Private Limited, Office no. 6, 2nd Floor, Sector-B, Pocket no. 7, Plot no. 11, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi - 110070

title: ADIDAS SUPERSTAR X LEGO® SHOES
subtitle: womens original
discription_head: EXCLUSIVE SHOES FROM THE LEGO® SUPERSTAR COLLECTION.
discription: Two iconic looks meet as the LEGO Group brings its instantly recognisable aesthetics to the classic Superstar. Featuring custom-made shell toe, serrated 3-Stripes and heel, carefully crafted to replicate the LEGO® brick in black and white. Available only at adidas online and in-store. An exclusive style you won't find anywhere else.

title: PRIMEBLUE SST TRACK JACKET
subtitle: womens original
discription_head: AN ICONIC TRACK JACKET MADE WITH RECYCLED MATERIALS
discription: A track jacket like never before. Sure, this may look just like iconic adidas gear from the archive, but this Primeblue SST Track Top symbolises change. The iconic silhouette is made with Parley Ocean Plastic that's made from upcycled plastic waste collected from ocean shores. It's a statement style that's good for the planet too. Stand up, stand out and join adidas' commitment to help end plastic waste.
value: adidas India Marketing Private Limited, Office no. 6, 2nd Floor, Sector-B, Pocket no. 7, Plot no. 11, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi - 110070

title: OWN THE RUN HOODED WIND JACKET
subtitle: womens original
discription_head: A WATER-REPELLENT JACKET FOR RUNNING IN WIND AND LIGHT RAIN
discription: Don't think about the weather. The shifting temperatures might be out of your control, but your comfort levels aren't. The key is layering, specifically with this adidas running jacket. It has a water-repellent finish so you can keep running through stiff breezes and light drizzle. Zip up, flip the hood and get out there.
details1: Front pockets with one sweat-guard pocket

subtitle: womens Running
discription_head: STEP UP YOUR RUNS IN THESE LIGHT WEIGHT FLEXIBLE & BREATHABLE SHOES

Midsole is again design with maximum EVA foam at heel which provide energize comport for all sports throughout the day.

title: ADISSAGE SLIDES
subtitle: Swim
discription_head: MASSAGE SLIDES FOR AFTER A WORKOUT.
discription: These adidas Adissage slides have a flexible nubby footbed that massages hardworking feet and a bandage upper that adjusts for a custom fit. These slides are designed for post-workout rejuvenation and not for all-day comfort. If you are looking for an all-day comfort massage slide, try our Adilette Comfort Slides.
